column2: Domaine de Ronchinne - Chateau et Ecuries
column3: The location, in the middle of nature
column4: Very old fashioned rooms, dirty carpet, dirty armchair, basic bathroom

column2: Domaine de Ronchinne - Chateau et Ecuries
column3: The place was being refurbed and the staff really were very un helpful We were a group of 6 people and wanted two twin rooms and one double we got a double plus another double and a triple room but really was not what we asked for . the bar was open and took the staff twenty mins to serve us for one drink then a new staff member  arrived and he would not serve us until after 0000 and we were wanting a beer at 1144 joke. never again use this place looks stunning and run by idiots
column4: loads not good the bathroom in the triple room was dirty and not suitable for three people

column2: Domaine de Ronchinne - Chateau et Ecuries
Domaine de Ronchinne - Chateau et Ecuries
column3: Beautiful scenery! The castle with his rooms on a sunny hill are lovely and relaxing, as well is the brand new spa. Great for a weekend out.
column4: Unfortunately the restaurant isn't open except on Friday and Saturday, and the bar is very unoccupied as well, so besides you might getting hungry, the hotel misses some lively athmosphere.

column2: Domaine de Ronchinne - Chateau et Ecuries
column3: The breakfast was perfect! Ideal location and great views. I'v never seen such a good service, very friendly and professional staff.

column2: Domaine de Ronchinne - Chateau et Ecuries
column4: No tea/ coffee making facilities in the bedroom.

column2: Domaine de Ronchinne - Chateau et Ecuries
column3: Lovely place to stay with lots of charm. Great balance of activities. Staff very kind and competent.
column4: The family lodging was like a dormitory without any charm in contrast to the rest of the place. Just 4 beds little furniture and the ceiling beams at 1.65 m high were like obstacles. So quality for price no what we expected.
